name: kalidao
description: Here lies the subgraph of KALI

scripts.deploy-rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --product hosted-service nerderlyne/kali-rinkeby
scripts.deploy-mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --product hosted-service nerderlyne/kali-mainnet
scripts.deploy-arbitrum: yarn prepare:arbitrum && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --product hosted-service nerderlyne/kali-arbitrum
scripts.deploy-polygon: yarn prepare:polygon && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --product hosted-service nerderlyne/kali-matic
